verses.verse: Then David<WH1732> came<WH935> to Nob<WH5011> to Ahimelech<WH288> the priest;<WH3548> and Ahimelech<WH288> came<WH2729> trembling<WH2729> to meet<WH7122> David,<WH1732> and said<WH559> to him, "Why<WH4069> are you alone<WH905> and no<WH369> one<WH376> with you?"
